text: Thomas James Perkins (January 7, 1932 â€“ June 7, 2016) was an American businessman and capitalist. He was one of the founders of venture capital firm Kleiner Perkins Caufield & Byers. Perkins died June 7, 2016 after a long- illness at his home in Marin County, California, aged 84. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in California Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:Businesspeople from California
